Text: Goldman SachsJim I wanted to take a moment and wish you and Carrin the best for the holiday season Goodness knows we have all had an extraordinary I am guessing this has been a year unlike any other for you and your family Heres to a very healthy and happy Lets get together in the new year when you have a moment to focus on your personal matters Until then should you need anything please let me know Regards Thomas A Bres Vice President Goldman Sachs Co Louisiana Suite Houston TX Tel Fax email website Goldman Sachs This material is for your private information and we are not soliciting any business based upon it Opinions expressed are our present opinions only The material is based upon information which we consider reliable but we do not represent that it is accurate or complete and it should not be relied upon as such We or persons involved in the preparation or issuance of this material may from time to time have long or short positions in and buy and sell securities or options of companies mentioned herein

Carrin PatmanJim I can imagine the firestorm and I trust you would let me know if we could somehow be of assistance I cant think of a better group to weather the circumstances than you and your extremely talented team I will keep this brief Carrin requested an asset allocation model based on your combined assets Pls let me know if you are comfortable with our including the detail of your assets in a presentation to Carrin We hoped to respond to Carrin today but I will not do so until I hear from you Regards Thomas A Bres Vice President Goldman Sachs Co Louisiana Suite Houston TX Tel Fax email website Goldman Sachs This material is for your private information and we are not soliciting any business based upon it Opinions expressed are our present opinions only The material is based upon information which we consider reliable but we do not represent that it is accurate or complete and it should not be relied upon as such We or persons involved in the preparation or issuance of this material may from time to time have long or short positions in and buy and sell securities or options of companies mentioned herein
